website_summaries.verdict: The newest addition to the Adidas Originals, the Supercourt represents the fifty-year lineage of classic tennis sneakers of the Three Stripes. Its upper comprises of vintage plush leather, which takes on the shades of tennis whites, and a perforated 3-Stripes run along the sidewalls. Moreover, the understated overlays and panels, along with the surprisingly thick, sculpted rubber sole construction, bring about a fresh, sophisticated look. The Supercourt is perhaps the best reimagined Adidas silhouette at present.
pros: The Adidas Supercourt is within an affordable price range, which has delighted heaps of shoppers
It’s highly recommended by dozens of reviewers, who are surprised by its astounding overall quality
The majority of wearers are captivated by its minimalistic design and unique paneling, which look pleasant on the eyes
It is easy to style as its clean styling fits almost any casual outfit, various users have noted
A good deal of fans express that the Supercourt seems better than the Stan Smiths, Continental 80s, and Superstars
Its supple leather upper feels so premium and easy to clean, according to many users
Several testers remark that the Adidas Supercourt delivers a “game-changing” level of comfort
Plenty of customers mention that this trainer is robust and built to last as a daily beater, adding you can do anything with it
cons: Some wearers report that the Supercourt fits quite wide
A considerable number of reviewers have pointed out slippage issues caused by the leather insert and the wide and deep heel cup area

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Love my new shoes. Stuck at home with social distancing, I wear the Adidas to get walking exercise at home. Excellent fit and they protect my feet as I trudge around my cement-floor basement.
customer_reviews.author: R. F.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I ordered two pairs! Spacious and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Careful about the size
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing and feels comfortable. I think it looks extremely good. But I did a mistake by listening to one commenter here telling us to get half size down. Turns out it was just a kid who would find anything too big. My toes touch the end of my shoe now thanks to him but thankfully it is a soft leather so I can live with it. These shoes are true to size, get your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Seymur Vagif

customer_reviews.title: Classic good looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Genuine leather sneakers under forty bucks I bought the white on white last year my sneaker game is straight
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fantastic can’t beat 21$! For a pair of adidas
customer_reviews.author: mr jack

customer_reviews.title: White/Cream, great quality. comes with box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a gift for a friend, and my friend loves them. I went with the white/cream color for the classy but still casual look.
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice classic style sneaker but it fit a little too large.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The article has the exact measurement that any other shoe he uses, unluckily I read comments that said to ask for half a number less, that was my mistake! But it is a great product, buy the size you are, no more, no less
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Játiva

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: They run a little big so I had to order a half size smaller than usual. Super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Super nice seller good size real adidas 10 out of 10 i like it next time i will buy again it was even cheap. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Klizma
